ygData.subject: Re:
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Supposedly looted from Nagafen the dragon after one of those parties where 30 level 47+ players gang up to take out one uber-mob.  IIRC, the owner reported
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 25 Aug 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> There is a new instrument posted on AllaKhazam's Magical Realm
> http://everquest.gamestats.com/ called the "
> Drum of Selo's March: Percussion Instrument. "
> Anyone have any info on this?

Supposedly looted from Nagafen the dragon after one of those
parties where 30 level 47+ players gang up to take out one
uber-mob. IIRC, the owner reported a 30% boost to percussion
songs (as opposed to a 20% boost for the Mistmoore Battle Drum
- kinda makes you wonder if there's a 10% drum out there...).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
